channel.title: PAR:TTE on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in PAR:TTE on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Total Maintains Buybacks Even as Profit Falls and Debt Rises
item.description: TotalEnergies SE maintained plans for quarterly share buybacks and this year’s capital expenditure, even as lower oil prices weighed on profit and net debt increased.

item.title: Total Maintains Buybacks Even as Profit Falls and Debt Rises
item.description: TotalEnergies SE maintained plans for quarterly share buybacks and this year’s capital expenditure, even as lower oil prices weighed on profit and net debt increased.

item.title: TotalEnergies Debt Surges as Quarterly Profit Declines
item.description: TotalEnergies SE reported a big jump in net debt while second-quarter profit dropped 23% as the French energy major grapples with falling oil and gas prices.

item.title: TotalEnergies Debt Surges as Quarterly Profit Declines
item.description: TotalEnergies SE reported a big jump in net debt while second-quarter profit dropped 23% as the French energy major grapples with falling oil and gas prices.
